title: Ticket #7395: Escape newline in file transfer hold messages
description:
If the file transfer object includes a hold message with a newline character (not impossible, considering part of the hold message can come from a file transfer plugin -- which outputs in new ClassAd format), then the hold message is completely ignored by the schedd as newlines are invalid characters.

The FTO should escape newline characters in hold messages; it's a slight change to the message but has the upside of making the message actually visible!
